explanation: [0-0] A hand wearing a silver chain ring is about to press an elevator button, with the English caption "POV: You enter the elevator" at the top of the screen.

[0-9] Then, the elevator button is pressed, lighting up in blue. The elevator door opens, revealing four people inside looking out with puzzled expressions. The person on the far left is wearing a light blue short-sleeved shirt with an ice cream print. The person next to him is wearing a blue baseball short-sleeved shirt. Beside them is someone in a black short-sleeved shirt and a black baseball cap. The person on the far right is wearing a black printed short-sleeved shirt, with curly hair and a black baseball cap. The man in the black baseball cap waves to the person at the elevator entrance. Then, the camera zooms in on the person in the blue baseball short-sleeved shirt, who turns to the camera and smiles.
